enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for sophomore, junior, and seniors in the Acting track.
Add Consent: Instructor Consent Required
title: SoC THEATRE 349-2-24 Acting III: Problems in Style
topic: The Business of Acting - Preparing for Life as a W

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This class serves to prepare the student actor for the business of being an actor. We cover steps to building a small business, fundamentals of auditioning, guest speakers, meetings with managers, agents and casting directors. Research is done on cities with thriving artistic communities. It is a comprehensive look at the transition from being a student to becoming a professional.

subject: THEATRE
